lines.text: I want a couple of hamburgers... and I'd like them raw.
What if she's right - he didn't do it, and they give him the chair?
Suppose they do? What difference does it make? There's too many people in the world anyway.
What's the use of talking to you? You think everything's a joke.
My son, it is. If it weren't, life wouldn't be worth living.

[Referrig to Meng]
Did you ever want to kill a man?

[Patronizingly]
My son, there's murder in every intelligent man's heart.
He's no man. He's a worm - the kind you ought to jump on with heavy boots.
You'll have to do an awful lot of jumping. The earth is covered with them.

[Angrily]
It'd be a real pleasure to cut his throat!

[Noticing his dinner knife]
Hey, you're not kidding. Put down that knife!
They send you to take me back?
No, who?
Don't you know? The people who lock you up.
Why do they want to lock you up?

[Matter-of-factly]
Oh, so they can hurt me. They put you in a shirt with long sleeves, and they pour ice water on you.

[while he's shaving]
So now, you believe both murders were committed by the same man, ay?
Yes, I do.
both murders were discovered by the same man - you!
What are you driving at?
Tell me, has there ever been any insanity in your family?

[Noticing a sleeping juror]
Juror #2, the jury will pay strict attention to the evidence.
I'm sorry, your honor, I was up all night with a terrible toothache.

[Scolding him]
Well, that's too bad, but it's your duty to stay awake and try to follow the evidence with as much intelligence as you've got.

[Referring to Joe Briggs' attorney]
I wouldn't let him defend me if it was for stealing an apple.

[Objecting to Ward's typing]
If you have to write, write with a pencil!

[Noticing how Meng is eyeing up the legs of a pretty girl]
Who's that citizen?
He's my next door neighbor.
He looks as though his mind could stand a little laundering.
Oh, excuse me. I thought you'd already gone already.
